name: reactor-extension-alloy
description: The Adobe Experience Platform Web SDK allows for streaming data into the platform, syncing identities, personalizing content, and more.

scripts.build: conc --pad-prefix --names "alloy,fixtures,manifest,lib,views" "pnpm run build:alloy" "pnpm run build:componentFixtures" "pnpm run build:extensionManifest" "pnpm run build:lib" "pnpm run build:views"
scripts.watch: conc --pad-prefix --names "alloy,fixtures,manifest,lib,views" "pnpm run build:alloy" "pnpm run build:componentFixtures" "pnpm run build:extensionManifest" "pnpm run watch:lib" "pnpm run watch:views"
scripts.dev: pnpm run build && conc --pad-prefix --names "watch,sandbox" "pnpm run watch" "pnpm run sandbox"
scripts.test: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest run && pnpm run test:functional
scripts.test:coverage: rimraf coverage && pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest run --coverage
scripts.test:unit: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest run --project=unit
scripts.test:unit:watch: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest --project=unit
scripts.test:integration: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest run --project=integration
scripts.test:integration:watch: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest --project=integration
scripts.test:integration:debug: pnpm exec playwright install chromium && vitest --project=integration --browser=chromium --browser.provider=playwright --browser.headless=false
scripts.test:functional: pnpm run build && WEB_SERVER_PORT=4000 conc --pad-prefix --kill-others --hide serve --names "serve,test" "pnpm run test:serve" "testcafe playwright:chromium --esm test/functional/specs"
scripts.test:functional:component: pnpm run build && WEB_SERVER_PORT=4000 conc --pad-prefix --kill-others --hide serve --names "serve,test" "pnpm run test:serve" "testcafe --esm playwright:chromium test/functional/specs/component"
scripts.test:functional:runtime: pnpm run build && WEB_SERVER_PORT=4000 conc --pad-prefix --kill-others --hide serve --names "serve,test" "pnpm run test:serve" "testcafe --esm playwright:chromium test/functional/specs/runtime"
scripts.test:functional:view: pnpm run build && WEB_SERVER_PORT=4000 conc --pad-prefix --kill-others --hide serve --names "serve,test" "pnpm run test:serve" "testcafe --esm playwright:chromium test/functional/specs/view"
scripts.test:functional:watch: WEB_SERVER_PORT=4000 conc --pad-prefix --kill-others --hide serve --names "serve,test" "pnpm run test:serve" "testcafe --esm --live playwright:chromium test/functional/specs/"
